About me

I graduated my MA studies at the SWPS University in the field of Communication&Media.
I worked as Research Analyst, UX Designer and then went on to work as a UX Researcher. Right now I'm developing in UI Design.

I believe that my main job is to find the best possible way to solve a number of problems, no matter if they are the “real-world” problems or they are based on values ​​and emotions.

My process

01
Discover
